H0.text: The cruise liner "Costa Concordia" sank in the Tyrhenian sea in January 2012 against the rocks of the coast of what island?". Elba

H1.text: The cruise liner "Costa Concordia" sank in the Tyrhenian sea in January 2012 against the rocks of the coast of what island?". Sardinia

H2.text: The cruise liner "Costa Concordia" sank in the Tyrhenian sea in January 2012 against the rocks of the coast of what island?". Capri

H3.text: The cruise liner "Costa Concordia" sank in the Tyrhenian sea in January 2012 against the rocks of the coast of what island?". Giglio
